function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Complex relationship between users and their residential space","Impact":"Inadequate design for spatial needs and lifestyle changes, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough user studies and regular spatial assessments to adapt to changing needs and lifestyles","Technologies":"User behavior tracking technology, modular design concepts","People":"Residents, building occupants","Owner":"Architects, building developers, facility managers"},{"Description":"Lack of education and understanding among stakeholders in the design process","Impact":"Misalignment of design with user needs, leading to increased risk of contagious disease transmission","Mitigation":"Provide comprehensive education and continuous learning for decision-makers, investors, and end users on the importance of adaptive design","Technologies":"Online learning platforms, virtual reality simulations","People":"Decision-makers, investors, end users","Owner":"Architects, educational institutions, building developers"},{"Description":"Inadequate adaptation of existing housing stock to the new resilient residential space concept","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission due to outdated infrastructure and spatial configurations","Mitigation":"Develop retrofitting guidelines for implementing the new concept in existing housing stock, conduct thorough assessments of retrofitting feasibility","Technologies":"Smart building technologies, energy-efficient retrofits","People":"Residential communities, building occupants","Owner":"Architects, building developers, retrofitting specialists"}]}
